resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum bibendum dui ornare tellus finibus, vel tristique eros tincidunt. In laoreet ipsum a accumsan imperdiet. Praesent iaculis neque ligula, non tincidunt magna faucibus non.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
It always seems impossible until it is done.
Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Til your good is better and your better is best.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Temp text here\nI was feeling really sad.\nSo sad.
